lines.text: You want a demonstration? Ha! You must cross my palm with gold first.
I can already see that you are headed for trouble!
I can read your thoughts. They are filled with Pokémon, and nothing but Pokémon.
That's really not interesting to me. Away with you!
I have the power to predict your future! I see many battles, and a teensy bit of glory.
For a few pieces of gold, I'm sure I would see a lot more glory.
You have come to the world's greatest fortune teller! Ask, and I shall reveal all!
Which Pokémon should you use in the next battle? How should I know? Be off with you!
